verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2398>sin,<s%> and <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3584>lie<s%> to his <S%H5997>neighbor<s%> in that which was <S%H6487>delivered<s%> him to keep, <S%H176>or<s%> in <S%H8667>fellowship,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in a thing <S%H1497>taken<s%> away by <S%H1498>violence,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> has <S%H6231>deceived<s%> his <S%H5997>neighbor;<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> have <S%H4672>found<s%> that which was <S%H9>lost,<s%> and <S%H3584>lies<s%> concerning it, and <S%H7650>swears<s%> <S%H5921>falsely;<s%> <S%H8267><s%> in <S%H259>any<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> these that a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>does,<s%> <S%H2398>sinning<s%> <S%H2063>therein:<s%>

Then it shall be, <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and is <S%H816>guilty,<s%> that he shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> he took <S%H1500>violently<s%> away, <S%H176>or<s%> the thing <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6231>deceitfully<s%> gotten, <S%H176>or<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H6487>delivered<s%> him to <S%H6485>keep,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H9>lost<s%> thing <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H4672>found,<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H5921>about<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H8267>falsely;<s%> he shall even <S%H7999>restore<s%> it in the <S%H7218>principal,<s%> and shall <S%H3254>add<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5921>thereto,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it to him to <S%H834>whom<s%> it appertains, in the <S%H3119>day<s%> of his <S%H819>trespass<s%> offering.

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> with your <S%H6187>estimation,<s%> for a <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering, to the <S%H3548>priest:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him for <S%H259>any<s%> thing of <S%H3605>all<s%> that he has <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H819>trespassing<s%> therein.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>Command<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering: It is the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H4169>burning<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> to the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H3344>burning<s%> in it.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on his <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4055>garment,<s%> and his <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> shall he <S%H3847>put<s%> on his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H7311>take<s%> up the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>consumed<s%> with the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and he shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he shall <S%H6584>put<s%> off his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3318>carry<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

And the <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H3344>burning<s%> in it; it shall not be <S%H3518>put<s%> out: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> on it every <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and lay the <S%H6999>burnt<s%> offering in <S%H6186>order<s%> on it; and he shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings.
The <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H8548>ever<s%> be <S%H3344>burning<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> it shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3518>go<s%> out.

And <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the meat <S%H4503>offering:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he shall <S%H7311>take<s%> of it his <S%H7062>handful,<s%> of the <S%H5560>flour<s%> of the meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell,<s%> even the <S%H234>memorial<s%> of it, to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> thereof shall <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H398>eat:<s%> with <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread shall it be <S%H398>eaten<s%> in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

It shall not be <S%H644>baked<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven.<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it to them for their <S%H2506>portion<s%> of my offerings made by fire; it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> as is the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and as the <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering.

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H2145>males<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of it. It shall be a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations<s%> concerning the offerings of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made by fire: <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H5060>touches<s%> them shall be <S%H6942>holy.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H3119>day<s%> when he is <S%H4886>anointed;<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H8548>perpetual,<s%> <S%H4276>half<s%> of it in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H4276>half<s%> thereof at <S%H6153>night.<s%>

In a <S%H4227>pan<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H8081>oil;<s%> and when it is <S%H7246>baked,<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it in: and the <S%H8601>baked<s%> <S%H6595>pieces<s%> of the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall you <S%H7126>offer<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> that is <S%H4899>anointed<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> it: it is a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> it shall be <S%H3632>wholly<s%> <S%H6999>burnt.<s%>
For <S%H3605>every<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be <S%H3632>wholly<s%> <S%H6999>burnt:<s%> it shall not be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering: In the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering is <S%H7819>killed<s%> shall the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering be <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> that <S%H2398>offers<s%> it for <S%H2398>sin<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it: in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> shall it be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

<S%H3605>Whatever<s%> shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> thereof shall be <S%H6942>holy:<s%> and <S%H834>when<s%> there is <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof on any <S%H899>garment,<s%> you shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> that where <S%H834>on<s%> <S%H5921><s%> it was <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

But the <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> it is <S%H1310>sodden<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> it be <S%H1310>sodden<s%> in a <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H3627>pot,<s%> it shall be both <S%H4838>scoured,<s%> and <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> in <S%H4325>water.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H2145>males<s%> among the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof: it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

And <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, <S%H834>whereof<s%> any of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> is <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> to <S%H3722>reconcile<s%> with in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, shall be <S%H398>eaten:<s%> it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the <S%H784>fire.<s%>
